title: Do collagen supplements actually help your skin?
description: Got a beauty conundrum? Our expert is here to offer advice. This week, Susan is wondering whether an oral anti-ageing regime is worth the moneyCollagen is now being added into everything from our skincare to our morning coffee. It’s a protein found in skin, hair, nails, bones and muscles and is said to help improve skin elasticity and volume. The natural ageing process, sun damage and lifestyle factors such as smoking and diet can affect our collagen levels, which is why collagen in drink and supplement form, usually animal derived, has become so popular.Yet there’s still doubt over whether it works. Laura Dowling, a pharmacist specialising in female health, cites a study from 2019 that “found very good evidence to support the use of oral collagen supplements to improve skin health”. But aesthetic practitioner Dr Yannis Alexandrides, founder of the 111 Harley St Clinic, says: “Collagen supplements have not been proven to improve the quality of the skin. More research is necessary to establish effectiveness.” Continue reading...

title: The 23 Best Weekender Bags For Long-Weekend Travel
description: Lengthy trips call for breaking out our best rolling luggage, but what about those two- to three-day escapes? For the quick getaway, we need a travel bag that allows us to sail smoothly through various micro-jaunts, whether they’re via plane, train, or automobile — the kind of multifaceted carrier that can hold the travel outfits and accessories we want without weighing us down, all while still looking stylish. This is where the weekender bag shines.The best travel bags for women run the gamut in terms of size and shape. What’s right for you depends upon your personal packing preferences: There are durable duffles ripe for overstuffing, and large canvas totes for folding up an extra outfit or two. Because each of these bags is built for holding a select amount of belongings, they will ultimately help streamline your packing process to include only the essentials for short stays. No matter which one you pick, rest assured you’ll be able to flutter to and from all your future adventures easily by slinging one of them over your shoulder. Whether you’re traveling for one night or three, these are the best weekender bags to help you do it in style.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can’t-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Coach Soft Empire Carryall Bag 40Coach will forever have our hearts thanks to its timeless styles and high-quality leather goods. Right now, we're eyeing the trending Empire Carryall 40 as our next chic Mary Poppins-inspired weekender.Shop CoachCoach Soft Empire Carryall Bag 40, $, available at CoachLululemon On My Level Barrel Duffle Bag 16LWith just enough ergonomic storage, external adjustable straps, and zippered pockets (both internal and external!), this no-funny-business tote makes it easy to pack all your stuff for a quick getaway. It’s crafted out of water-repellent fabric, so it’s easy to wipe clean and great for the wet, rainy months.Shop LululemonLululemon On My Level Barrel Duffle Bag 16L, $, available at LululemonVuori All Around ToteAt 12L, this tote is for the lightest of weekend packers who want to maintain their effortless style vibes. You can carry the essentials for a short weekend, and it can double as an everyday tote once you unpack.Shop VuoriVuori All Around Tote, $, available at VuoriKavu Little Feller Duffle BagIf you’re into the utility-inspired trend, the Little Feller is the perfect weekender bag for you, no matter where you’re traveling — easily fitting in an airplane’s overhead bin. This is made of sturdy, water-resistant fabric and outfitted with multiple zippered compartments as well as straps, so you can carry it as a duffel or a backpack.Shop Kavu At Free PeopleKAVU Little Feller Duffle Bag, $, available at Free PeopleSamsonite Virtuosa Wheeled DuffelIf you tend to overpack, try out this weekender that has wheels and a trolley handle from quality luggage company Samsonite.Shop Samsonite at Macy'sSamsonite Virtuosa Wheeled Duffel, $, available at Macy'sBéis The WeekenderWe love The Weekender, made with sleek waterproof canvas, ample storage space, and a multitude of zip pockets — one even converts to a sleeve, so you can easily slide it over a suitcase handle for your next journey.Shop BéisBéis The Weekender, $, available at BéisFendi FF Allover Duffle Bag With Text LogoWhile this is a kid's duffle, it happens to be the perfect size for a weekend getaway for those who love a little luxury in their life.Shop Fendi at Neiman MarcusFendi FF Allover Duffle Bag With Text Logo, $, available at Neiman MarcusStoney Clover Lane Getaway Tote BagA roomy lilac tote that literally says "getaway" on the outside, that's a yes from us! This tote is the perfect pick for a quick weekend trip.Shop Stoney Clover Lane at RevolveStoney Clover Lane Getaway Tote Bag, $, available at RevolveCalpak Terra 26L Laptop Duffle BackpackWhether you’re going on a short weekend getaway to the next town over or far away, the Terra backpack duffle will make sure you only pack what you can carry. Created with an eco-friendly recycled ripstop polyester, this durable piece can fit what you need, in whatever way you wanna carry it.Shop CalpakCalpak Terra 26L Laptop Duffel Backpack, $, available at CalpakPop Ups Brand Everyday Neoprene ToteNo need to sacrifice space for style. Covered in a beautiful botanical print, Pop Ups Brands’ tote is great for throwing all your weekend necessities in without a second thought. Made of sturdy, water-resistant neoprene, this tote can just be popped in the washing machine to erase all weekend spills.Shop Pop Ups Brand At AnthropologiePop Ups Brand Everyday Neoprene Tote, $, available at AnthropologieEverlane The ReNew Transit WeekenderThis under-$100 option from Everlane is just the right (carry-on) size for a weekend business trip. It’s made from 100% recycled fabric and includes a padded laptop sleeve, two water bottle holders, an exterior zip pocket, and a convenient luggage handle pass-through.Shop EverlaneEverlane The ReNew Transit Weekender, $, available at EverlanecoachxycShop CoachTumi Contine WeekenderWe love the luxurious look of Tumi’s travel goods. Check out this nylon and leather weekender equipped with all the compartments you’ll ever need, including a quick-access phone pocket, laptop compartment, zippered bottom compartment, and more.Shop Tumi At AnthropologieTUMI Contine Weekender, $, available at AnthropologieQuince Italian Leather Triple Compartment WeekenderWhat do we want? Compartments! Where do we want them? In our weekender bags! Quince’s Italian leather bag is the epitome of a great weekender bag, with just enough space that you can throw stuff in one of the three zippered compartments, but not too much that you’ll overpack.Shop QuinceQuince Italian Leather Triple Compartment Weekender, $, available at QuinceMZ Wallace Nik BagHow darling is this green plaid print? Not only is she cute, but she’s also functional. In the interior, there is tons of organized space in the form of pockets, compartments, and detachable bags. Then, on the exterior, the Nik bag has even more organizational pockets.Shop MZ WallaceMZ WALLACE Nik, $, available at MZ WallaceVera Bradley Original Tote BagIn a blast to the past, Vera Bradley teamed up with Urban Outfitters to offer you the roomy Original Tote Bag in three prints. What’s better than toting around a colorful Vera Bradley tote for a long weekend like it’s 2003?Shop Vera Bradley At Urban OutfittersVera Bradley Original Tote Bag, $, available at Urban OutfittersJ.Crew Weekender Montauk ToteJ.Crew’s beachy tote is appropriately weekender-sized and is crafted from a durable-yet-soft cotton canvas. The travel-friendly bag also comes equipped with a zippered top, an inner storage pocket, and a detachable woven strap shoulder strap. As one pleased reviewer puts it, this is a “[v]ery nicely made bag. Perfect for the weekend with inside pockets and a long removable shoulder strap. I’ve even put my dog in it.”Shop J.CrewJ.Crew Weekender Montauk Tote, $, available at J.CrewFjällräven Kånken WeekenderFrom the Swedish makers of the adorable Kånken backpack comes its older sibling that can carry much larger loads — like, enough for the weekend. The Weekender looks like a bigger version of the backpack, and can be carried as such with backpack straps. (It’s also equipped with a shoulder strap.) This pastel lavender color is precious, but you can choose from seven other earthy tones.Shop FjällrävenFjällräven Kånken Weekender, $, available at FjällrävenRoverlund Ready-To-Roll Cabin Carry-OnWeekenders don’t have to be all totes and duffels. While it’s not technically a bag, we love Roverlund’s iteration of the roller cabin carry-on. This has all the storage and pockets of a conventional hard roller — it’s just horizontal, so you can conveniently stack stuff (e.g. your furry best friend you can’t go anywhere without) on top.Shop RoverlundRoverlund Ready-To-Roll Cabin Carry-On, $, available at RoverlundAway The Everywhere BagThis sleek duffle is a standard-sized version of R29-approved brand Away’s best-selling style, designed to go everywhere with you. It is made of water-resistant nylon material and has an assortment of compartments, including a padded laptop pocket, and a trolley sleeve to carry it on your wheeled suitcase.Shop AwayAway The Everywhere Bag, $, available at AwayHalfday Travel The Garment Duffel 45LThe carry-on-sized duffel may look like a normal top-zippered duffel, but it actually unfolds flat to store hanging clothes as well. Meaning: You can put a few dresses or suits in the hanging compartment, roll that up, then fit all the rest of your travel necessities in the regular compartment, just like a traditional duffel. The bag also features two shoe pockets, as well as a back trolley sleeve for convenience.Shop Halfday TravelHalfday Travel The Garment Duffel 45L, $, available at Halfday TravelLeatherology Kessler Medium DuffelFor weekend travel, the Kessler duffle is a personal favourite of R29’s senior director of editorial, Carli Whitwell. Made of buttery soft, full-grain leather, this duffel features six pockets ripe for the filling — with options to personalize starting at $35.Shop LeatherologyLeatherology Kessler Medium Duffle, $, available at LeatherologyDagne Dover Landon Carryall BagA more compact duffle than most, Dagne Dover’s Landon Carryall boasts multiple interior compartments and an expandable design that’s ideal for travelers looking to maintain a short packing list. This is also one of the best carryalls for women if you’re looking for a set of travel bags and accessories in the same color.Shop Dagne DoverDagne Dover Landon Carryall Bag, $, available at Dagne DoverL.L.Bean Boat and ToteIs there anything more classic than an oversized L.L.Bean tote made from extra-durable canvas? This weekend warrior comes in four size options and can be monogrammed to your heart’s desire for an additional $8.Shop L.L.BeanL.L. Bean Boat and Tote, $, available at L.L. BeanWANDF Foldable Travel DuffelWe’ve already done plenty of raving about this viral Amazon duffel, but its compact size, foldability, and can’t-be-beat price point make it the ultimate weekender.Shop WANDF at AmazonWANDF Foldable Travel Duffel Bag, $, available at AmazonKenzo Verdy Edition UtilityAt 15 by 20 inches, this tote is for the lightest of weekend packers who want to maintain their effortless style vibes. You can carry the essentials for a short weekend, and it can double as an everyday tote once you unpack.Shop Kenzo At SSENSEKenzo Verdy Edition Utility Large, $, available at SSENSEUnited Colors of Benetton x Delsey Paris Softside Carry-On DuffleWe love a good baby blue moment, especially in a bag as functional as this one, a collab between United Colors of Benetton and Delsey Paris. Made of water-resistant material, this tiny tote has 45L of great storage space, with a large main compartment and a smaller external zippered compartment.Shop Delsey ParisUnited Colors of Benetton x Delsey Paris Softside Carry-On Duffle, $, available at Delsey ParisLo & Sons Canvas Catalina Deluxe ToteThis washed-canvas satchel has more than earned its best weekender bag status. Thanks to this weekender’s compact yet organized compartments, you are all set for strategic long-weekend outfit storage (hello, separate shoe section) and convertible straps for adaptable toting (over-shoulder or cross-body).Shop Lo & SonsLo & Sons The Catalina Deluxe Tote, $, available at Lo & SonsCotopaxi Ligera 45L Duffle Bag At 45L, this small but mighty duffel made of 100% repurposed nylon is ready for any journey. Fitted with a top handle, a removable shoulder strap as well as backpack straps, the adjustable style lets you choose your own carrying adventure. What's fun is that each bag is one-of-a-kind, so you don't know what colorway you'll receive!Shop CotopaxiCotopaxi Chumpi 35L Duffel, $, available at CotopaxiBéis The Convertible Mini WeekenderUNHIDE LATER You loved The Weekender — now meet the Mini! Not only is it made with the same features as the original, like sleek waterproof canvas, ample storage space, and a multitude of zip pockets, but this mini Béis tote also features a bottom compartment that completely zips off.Shop BéisBéis The Convertible Mini Weekender, $, available at BéisVuori V1 Convertible ToteFor those who pack light, this is the perfect small-but-not-too-small water-resistant bag. Carry your stuff as a backpack or tote, and even bring your racket along for that leisurely weekend pickup game.Shop VuoriVuori V1 Convertible Tote, $, available at VuoriRains Hilo Weekend BagTraveling somewhere rainy? This baby blue slick duffle is made from 100% waterproof fabric and features a water-resistant zipper to keep all of your valuables safe and dry.Shop RainsRains Weekend Bag Small, $, available at RainsSteve Madden Quilted Weekender BagThis compact weekender is covered in quilted faux leather and includes convenient interior pockets and a cell phone slot. Plus, surprise (!), it’s lined in an eye-catching zebra print.Shop Steve Madden at DSWSteve Madden Quilted Weekender Bag, $, available at DSWG4Free 3-Way Duffel BackpackIf you plan on packing presents, work materials, a few too many pairs of shoes, extra layering bits, that sweater your sister loaned you last year... THIS is the hold-everything convertible pack for you.Shop G4Free at AmazonG4Free 3-Way Duffle Backpack, $, available at AmazonNisolo Simone Convertible Shopper BagSome people are overpackers, and some can just grab and go. If you are in the latter party, this is the perfect bag for you, it’s a chic leather tote large enough to fit all the essentials without getting bogged down with... Well, stuff. Shop Nisolo at AnthropologieNisolo Simone Convertible Shopper Bag, $, available at AnthropologieCarl Friedrik Palissy WeekendWe are fans of premium travel goods brand Carl Friedrik — if our Travel Editor Venus Wong's love letter to the trunk luggage wasn't proof enough. The weekender bag is no less luxurious than the trunk luggage; handcrafted out of leather with technical nylon canvas lining, it's effortlessly chic.Shop Carl FriedrikCarl Friedrik Palissy Weekend, $, available at Carl FriedrikPatagonia Black Hole Duffel BagWhat’s not to appreciate about this compact 55-liter duffel made with 100% recycled body fabric, lining, and webbing? It’s sleek, durable, and sustainable.Shop PatagoniaPatagonia Black Hole® Duffel Bag 55L, $, available at PatagoniaCotopaxi Chumpi 35L Duffel For the travellers that pack light, I applaud you and present a great Shop CotopaxiCotopaxi Chumpi 35L Duffel, $, available at CotopaxiKule The Take Out ToteAdd a little pep to your travel step with this smiley-faced canvas carryall.Shop KuleKule The Take Out Tote, $, available at KuleBao Bao Issey Miyake Prism Metallic ToteWhat is chic, pink, and sparkly all over? Issey Miyake's Prism Metallic Tote, of course! At 15.5" by 15.5" this tote is for the lightest of weekend packers who want to maintain their status as an effortless style icon. The adjustable tote handles will help you carry all you need for a short weekend and it can double as an everyday tote once you unpack.Shop Bao Bao Issey Miyake At SSENSEBao Bao Issey Miyake Pink Prism Metallic Tote, $, available at SSENSECotopaxi Chumpi 35L DuffelSometimes less is more, and Cotopaxi’s top-zipper duffel is the perfect example. While it is only 35L, this small but mighty duffel made of repurposed nylon is tough and ready for any journey. Fitted with a top handle, a removable shoulder strap as well as backpack straps, the adjustable duffel lets you choose your own carrying adventure.Shop CotopaxiCotopaxi Chumpi 35L Duffel, $, available at CotopaxiLululemon Wunderlust Weekender BagWith just enough ergonomic storage, external adjustable straps, and internal and external zippered pockets, this no-funny-business tote makes it easy to pack all your stuff for a quick getaway. DuffleThis eye-catching duffle is a part of Away’s newest collection of luggage specifically made for the outdoorsy traveler. Not to mention it’s water- and scratch-resistant!Shop MonosMonos Metro Duffel, $, available at MonosBaboon To The Moon Go-Bag Duffle MiniWhat’s lightweight, colorful, and has major space for a weekend getaway? Baboon to the Moon's Go-Bag Duffle Mini! Made of waterproof material, this durable bag has all the makings of a perfect weekender bag to showcase your personality and fit all your stuff. StrandWhether you're staying one night or a few, this bag has great space to hold your necessities and then some. Shop Marc Jacobs at Nordstrom RackMarc Jacobs Quilted Medium Tote Bag, $, available at Nordstrom RackThe North Face Base Camp DuffelNOT OUT OF STOCK JUST NOT POPULARFlexibility is at the core of this travel bag. Shop The North FaceThe North Face Base Camp Duffel—S, $, available at The North FaceNike One Club Duffel BagThis duffel bag features multiple compartments for your easy-to-lose travel bits and bobs, including a vented space to keep dirty clothes and shoes separate.Shop NikeNike One Club Women's Training Duffel Bag (24L), $, available at NikeLongchamp Le Pliage Energy Travel BagTravel in style with this chic minimalistic Longchamp weekender bag. It features a removable shoulder strap, so you can sling it around your shoulder and solely focus on getting to your destination. However, if you're ahead of schedule, enjoy the scenic route with the signature top handle in hand.Shop LongchampLongchamp Le Pliage Energy Travel Bag, $, available at NordstromMarc Jacobs Medium Weekend BagThe Medium Weekend Bag sure lives up to its name as an excellent option for a quick weekend getaway (or even a quick trip to the office!). Shop AdidasAdidas x Marimekko Allover Print Sports Backpack, $, available at AdidasMZ Wallace Travel Jim BagThe infamous brand's quilted gym-bags are pricey but worth it. This larger, weekender-sized style is durable and deceivingly roomy — with multiple interior compartments and a removable zip-up clutch for storing accessories. Shop MZ WallaceTote & Carry Burgundy Velour Duffle, $, available at Tote & CarryBaggu Duck BagThis relaxed lightweight tote can easily go from one night to two with its roomy interior pockets. Shop Urban OutfittersBaggu Duck Bag, $, available at Urban OutfittersFree People Quick Trip Weekender BagBook your weekend getaway now because you scored one of the most fashionable travel bags. You can choose between two slouchy multicolored silhouettes: a pastel sunrise theme and a red-orange Sedona-inspired desert one. It's a playful piece you'll also never miss at baggage claim if you're forced to gate-check it. Shop FP Collection at Free People FP Collection | Free People Quick Trip Weekender, $, available at Free PeopleLululemon Quilted Embrace Tote BagThis fun quilted duffle has several interior pockets, including one for a laptop and another for dirty clothes. It's also made out of water-repellent fabric, which makes this bag easy to wipe clean and great for the wet and rainy fall months.Shop LululemonLululemon Quilted Embrace Tote Bag 20L, $, available at LululemonBric's Rolling DuffelNot quite a suitcase, not quite a weekender, this sleek rolling duffel trimmed with leather is the hybrid bag our weekend trips away have been missing — enough space to pack your essentials with room for bringing stuff back.Shop Bric's Bric's X-Bag 21-Inch Rolling Duffle Bag, $, available at Bed Bath & BeyondMadewell The (Re)sourced Tote BagThis weekender bag from Madewell is made from recycled materials, has many pockets, a padded laptop compartment, and a trolley sleeve that slips onto the handle of your rolling luggage bag.Shop MadewellMadewell The (Re)sourced Tote Bag, $, available at MadewellZara Contrast Color ToteFor a versatile summer-appropriate option, check out this roomy woven tote that features sleek stripes, a magnetic closure, and can be personalized with an initial or phrase of your choice.Shop ZaraZara Contrast Color Tote Bag, $, available at ZaraCalpak Luka Soft-Side Duffel BagThis showstopping soft-shelled, yet durable tote has a multi-compartment interior and exterior with enough space for a change of clothes (shoes included).Shop CalpakCalpak Luka Duffel, $, available at CalpakLipault Paris City Plume 24-Hour BagStylish with enough capacity to house your 24-hour stay necessities while remaining light and sleek enough for slipping in and dipping out with ease.Shop Lipault ParisLipault City Plume 24H Bag, $, available at AmazonHerschel Novel DuffelLonger weekends away call for a duffle bag with ample space for rolling and stuffing all the travel necessities — this compact option blends utility with style to cover multiple days away.Shop HerschelHerschel Supply Co. Novel Duffel Bag, $, available at AmazonTote & Carry Velour DuffleHave you ever seen a duffle this luxe? This monochrome burgundy bag is vegan, features a removable strap, and satin lining. Plus, the brand also makes backpacks and laptop cases to match. Shop Tote & Carry Tote & Carry Burgundy Velour Duffle, $, available at Tote & CarryAlo Large Traverse DuffleThis sleek duffle is made for athletes on the go. It features stretchy outer straps to hold a yoga mat, a bottom zip compartment for shoes or dirty laundry, and several inside and outside pockets. Shop AloAlo Yoga Large Traverse Duffle, $, available at Alo YogaEverlane The Oversized CarryallFor a compact option, check out this oversized crossbody that is both machine-washable and roomy enough to fit everything you'd need for an overnight stay. Shop EverlaneEverlane The Oversized Carryall, $, available at EverlaneBaboon To The Moon Go-BagThe punchy brand's Go-Bag was made for tough weekend travelers with an even tougher sense of style. The duffle-backpack hybrid is touted as "indestructible," crafted from OM Stardust Ballistic shell material with alpine-grade double stitching in an array of vibrant colors and printed interiors. Shop Baboon To The MoonBaboon Go-Bag — Small (40L), $, available at BaboonEverlane The ReNew Transit WeekenderCrafted out of 100% recycled polyester, this tough convertible weekender is ready to haul. Its water-resistant design comes equipped with everything from a padded laptop sleeve to dual water-bottle holders, interior plus exterior zippered compartments, and an over-the-top-luggage sleeve.Shop EverlaneEverlane The ReNew Transit Weekender, $, available at EverlaneEverlane Twill WeekenderMade from durable twill with leather handles, this compact weekender is both soft and structured enough to safely store a few days worth of stuff.Shop EverlaneEverlane The Twill Weekender, $, available at EverlaneUniqlo Canvas Boston BagThis chic canvas duffle is under $20, and compact yet roomy enough to fit all of your essentials for a quick day trip or overnight stay. Shop UniqloUniqlo Canvas Boston Bag (Ines De La Fressange), $, available at UniqloFree People Quick Trip WeekenderNo weekend yoga retreat in the mountains is complete without this woven boho beauty.Shop Free PeopleFP Collection Quick Trip Weekender, $, available at Free PeopleAway The Everywhere BagThis even tighter take on the roomy duffle is perfect for a strict and stylish one-night stay.Madewell Canvas Overnight BagMadewell's version of a weekender combines a tote with a duffel and dresses it in canvas with leather trim for one stylish, roomy, and tote-worthy travel bag. Madewell Canvas Overnight Bag, $, available at MadewellKendall + Kylie WeekenderCrafted out of a durable technical-weave with a secure zip-top and optional crossbody strap, this athleisure-style tote is ready to sport up your weekend getaway games.Campomaggi Nylon ToteThis meticulously crafted tote is made of nylon with buttery leather handles and vintage-inspired details. Campomaggi Nylon Tote Bag, $, available at AnthropologieLeSportsac Medium Overnight Bag Breeze your way through a one to two-day stay in style with this deluxe overnight bag — made from durable and stylish textiles with multi pockets, compartments, and convertible straps for super streamlined travels.LeSportsac Dakota Medium Deluxe Overnight Bag, $, available at Nordstrom RackLike what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?These Gym Bags Are As Stylish As You5 Travel Outfits That Slay The AirportThe 15 Best Travel Journals For Your 2023 Trips
author: Elizabeth Buxton

title: The Best Fall 2024 Boot Trends, From Thigh-High To Western
description: .disclaimer{width:90%;margin-bottom:1rem}.disclaimer__lines{width:100%;margin:0 auto;border-bottom:1px solid #999;padding:0;max-width:150px}.disclaimer__copy{width:100%;max-width:355px;font-family:Brown Regular,sans-serif;font-size:.9rem;font-weight:300;line-height:1.3em;color:#333;padding:0 0 .4rem;margin:1rem auto;text-align:center} All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission. Cooler weather has finally arrived, which means it’s the perfect time to ready your seasonal wardrobe with some of the hottest trends for the season. Our bodies will shortly get swathed in fall jackets, cozy sweaters, and wide-leg jeans, but our feet are already crying out for trendy sneakers, chunky loafers, and cute boots for autumn.The biggest shoe trends for fall/winter 2024 are about as comfort-focused as we’ve ever seen, with perennial favorites like cowboy boots and over-the-knee boots making a major resurgence. There are also super-soft materials in the mix this season, like luxe suede, fuzzy shearling, and cushy puffer fabrics. Ahead, peep the best fall boots to slip into. We’ve rounded up a mix of everyday styles (for work and casual autumn activities) and occasion-specific footwear (for date nights and holiday parties). Whether you’re a comfort connoisseur who needs a slip-on shoe for errands or someone who wouldn’t be caught wearing a flat sole, there’s a new boot with your name on it to help you start the season on the right foot. DashDividers_1_500x100 Puffer Boots Part outdoor shoes, part slippers, puffer boots are the cozy style that will keep your feet extra warm throughout the fall and into the winter. Pick from an array of insulated and waterproof snow booties in sporty and lifestyle silhouettes. You can also take on the trend in heeled or platform styles that come with detachable puffer leg warmers for extra coverage (and utility). DashDividers_1_500x100 Thigh-High Boots Over-the-knee boots are a given in any fall shoe roundup. Taylor Swift has only cemented their eternal popularity, recently wearing burgundy Giuseppe Zanotti Frannie High Boots to a football game. Thigh-high boots make any outfit seasonally appropriate, especially if you show them off with on-trend bubble skirts or comfy leggings. Look out for classic suede, trendy denim, and dramatic leather styles, as well as ones with low kitten heels and sky-high stiletto heels. DashDividers_1_500x100 Suede Boots Suede boots will also always be a fall fashion must-have, and they’re already everywhere you look. You can find these luxe-looking shoes at nearly every footwear retailer, especially in knee-high form (with popular kitten heels) — though you can also find block-heel booties and flat ankle boots for more casual fall ‘fits. DashDividers_1_500x100 Animal Print Boots Much like leopard-print sneakers are proving to be extremely popular this fall, leopard-print boots are also coming for the footwear crown… as are every kind of animal-print boot, for that matter. From zebra-print boots popping up in fashion week street-style looks and textured snakeskin boots making a comeback, you can (and should) go wild with your footwear this season. Take it a step further by trying more obscure giraffe-print and cow-print boots (perfect for your cowgirl Halloween costume). DashDividers_1_500x100 Western Boots Buckle up as we ride off into fall with the Western trend. Thanks to Beyonce’s Cowboy Carter, Bella Hadid’s adorable equestrian romance, and Kacey Musgraves’ new horse-girl inspired Reformation collaboration, cowboy boots — which have been back — are showing no sign of dosey-doeing away. From tried-and-true leather knee-high styles to kitschy metallic ankle-grazing ones, Western boots can be as “yeehaw” or as fashion-forward as your heart desires. DashDividers_1_500x100 Furry Boots Back in February, plush clothing made an impactful impression at the NYFW Fall/Winter 2024 shows, as did furry shoes. (The latter first gained traction in 2023, and continues strong for autumn.) Hop on the (definitely cute, possibly divisive) trend with a pair of cozy shearling booties for everyday activities or chic faux-fur stiletto boots for stylish parties. Like what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?Step Into These 22 Knee-High Boots For FallThe Best Fall Sneaker Trends: Leopard & WedgesWe Found 26 Pairs Of The Best Chunky Loafers
author: Vivien Lee

title: 15 Comfortable Work Shoes For the Office and Beyond
description: When finding the perfect pair of work shoes, style ranks high on our wish lists but, naturally, so does comfort. From the subway to the office to after-work cocktails with your friends and beyond, these are the shoes you'll practically be living in daily, so it's important to shop for a pair that'll keep you feeling comfortable, supported, and chic. Ahead, we curated a list of this season's best and most comfortable work shoes for women, from slingback heels and black flats to business-casual shoes that can meet any office's dress-code requirements. Most importantly, they all have one thing in common: they'll become your go-to everyday pair. Depending on your job or daily journey, your comfort (and commute) requirements might have different needs. If you work in a more dressed-up environment with a walking commute, opt for classic, comfortable flats that you can wear with trousers. If your workplace is more casual and you drive, you can probably get away with wearing a pair of heels to spice things up. And, of course, we also made sure to include some versatile sneakers that pair well with all clothing items - and are even favorites of our own editors. Keep reading for our complete guide to the best women's work shoes. With styles from brands like Old Navy, Rothy's, and Everlane, there's something at every price point and markdown. Find your favorites and shop this season's best comfortable work shoes for standing all day. Related: The 15 Most Comfortable Walking Shoes
author: Kyley Warren

title: I Went to the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show - in a Lace Catsuit From the Runway
description: When I pulled out my Victoria's Secret Fashion Show getting-ready outfit from the shopping bag delivered to my doorstep, I was stoked. To be honest, I'd always wondered what it felt like to be one of the Angels getting her makeup done backstage in the brand's signature Satin Short Piped Robe ($60). Mine even came with the official VS merch emblem emblazoned in crystals on the back. Both the crystals and the matching baseball cap (which is sadly now sold out from the "Shop the Show" drop) made up for the fact that I had to do my own makeup before trekking it to Brooklyn's Duggal Greenhouse for the return of the legendary VS runway. Still, it was the outfit I slipped on after wearing the pink robe, the one I would ultimately wear to the show, that made me the most nervous: the Very Sexy Rose Lace Balconette Catsuit ($130). It was far more daring than the loungewear I had been sporting before, and I nearly put my foot in my mouth when I saw just how see-through the material actually was. As it would turn out, model and former First Lady of France Carla Bruni wore the very same design on the runway as I looked on from my seat in the audience, admiring her confidence. Suddenly, I didn't feel so eager to cover up in my oversize denim jacket anymore. In fact, seeing what my fellow showgoers were wearing also made me feel more liberated in my lingerie as we all watched a VS Fashion Show that was more body inclusive than ever before. Don't get me wrong: the brand still has a long way to go, in my opinion - viewers all over the world expressed that same sentiment after the spectacle wrapped - but getting to wear lingerie that's typically reserved for Angels made the runway fashion feel more accessible. Ahead, learn how I styled the VS Very Sexy Rose Lace Balconette Catsuit, worn by Bruni, and read my full review of the piece, which is still shoppable online. Carla Bruni on the Victoria's Secret Runway Image Source: Getty / TheStewartofNY/FilmMagic Bruni, who celebrated getting her wings ahead of the show, wore the VS Very Sexy Rose Lace Balconette Catsuit with the Lace Lightly Lined Demi Bra and the Twinkle Strap Lace Corset Set. Her shimmering beaded wings, chunky stone hoops, and wraparound sparkling stilettos amplified the glitzy boning on her top, with the catsuit itself acting as the foundation of her whole look. How to Style a Lace Catsuit As the wing-less spectator I am, I felt it appropriate to layer with an oversize denim jacket from Frame and opted for simple black pumps. I kept on my hat to add a sporty twist. Underneath, I was rocking the VS Shine Patch Lightly Lined Wireless Bra ($45) and VS Logo Cotton Shine Patch Hiphugger Panty ($15), a bra and underwear set I highly recommend for anyone who who prefers just a touch of glamour but favors comfort above all else. The wireless bra felt so smooth and lightweight, whereas the panties provided just enough coverage underneath the stocking-like bodysuit, without adding bulk. Victoria's Secret Very Sexy Rose Lace Balconette Catsuit Review As time went on, I grew to appreciate the catsuit more and more - and not just because I was inspired by Bruni's confidence. It really does have a stretchy feel to it so that it fits like a second skin. I also appreciate design details such as the illusion front panty panel and vertical front seams, which add undeniable sex appeal but sophistication all the same. The back zipper is also easy to maneuver without any help; and from a style perspective, it really does look good with a pair of heels, regardless of how many layers you add up top. My only gripe is that the sweetheart neckline is very low cut and the chest area is wide open, so if you want to layer a bra beneath the built-in cups, it will definitely be visible and may not align exactly how you pictured it. My advice is to try it with a few different bra and panty sets underneath until you find the perfect match for your shape. Of course, just like with a pair of tights, you'll want to pull up this bodysuit carefully because the lace embroidery is definitely delicate. Additional Details About the Victoria's Secret Very Sexy Rose Lace Balconette Catsuit The catsuit comes in sizes XS-XXL. I took my usual size, XS. It's unlined and partially made from recycled materials, including recycled polyamide and recycled elastane. Since there's no back coverage, you will see your bra band from behind (and it'll likely peek out in the front, too). The catsuit is hand wash only. Rating:
author: Sarah Wasilak
